name: Unnamed (M3gane)
description:
I created this game some time ago and I forgot about it. It's a small project made with Pygame - Python. I made it from free assets because, unfortunately, I don't have any artistic experience.

It was meant to be a platformer but there's practically no challenge whatsoever. It's also really short so don't get yourself hyped up too much :)

Sorry for so much negativity but it's not that much. If you'd want to play and experience this short game I'd be really happy. Thanks.
